definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: A small illustration of this is the experience of Richard Garriott.
sentences.chinese: 這副小小的插圖描繪的正是理查德加雷特的親身經歷。

sentences.english: Richard draws a picture each day.
sentences.chinese: 理查德每天都畫一幅畫。

sentences.english: Mary Kay's twenty-year-old son Richard was the company's financial official.
sentences.chinese: 玫琳凱20歲的兒子理查德是公司的財務。

sentences.english: Like Richard III, he has barricaded himself within lies.
sentences.chinese: 就跟理查德三世一樣，他被自己的謊言禁錮住了。

sentences.english: Richard is only skin and bones. He should get some nourishing food.
sentences.chinese: 理查德瘦得皮包骨頭，該喫點好的食物補補了。

sentences.english: Louise got a bum rap for tsimilarg sides with Richard.
sentences.chinese: 路易斯因爲左袒理查德而受到責罵。

sentences.english: When Alex began to discuss, chaussures homme, Richard explosion into a rage.
sentences.chinese: 當阿列克斯開始爭論時，理查德便大發雷霆。

sentences.english: Richard Murphy was clearly a Russian.
sentences.chinese: 很明顯理查德是俄羅斯人。

sentences.english: It is a state of affairs that makes Richard Bentall furious.
sentences.chinese: 業務狀況引起了理查德本陶的憤怒。

sentences.english: When Alex began to argue, Richard burst into a rage.
sentences.chinese: 當阿列克斯開始爭論時，理查德便大發雷霆。

sentences.english: Denise huffs and puffs, several steps behind Richard.
sentences.chinese: 丹妮絲呼哧呼哧喘着氣落在理查德身後幾步。

sentences.english: That’s the question taken up by Richard Haass in Newsweek.
sentences.chinese: 這是理查德哈斯在新聞週刊提出的問題。

sentences.english: I hope they help Richard and Natalie.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他們可以幫助理查德和納塔利。

sentences.english: Our World Affairs correspondent Richard Galpin reports.
sentences.chinese: 來自國際事務記者理查德加佩的報道。

sentences.english: Richard Boni was working on the filters from the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 理查德博尼從一開始就幹陶罐過濾器。
